function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective NPI implementation","Impact":"Increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of NPIs and public education","Technologies":"Communication tools for public health messaging","People":"General public, patients, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Misinformation and lack of trust in public health actions","Impact":"Inefficient implementation of public health measures","Mitigation":"Sharing factual information and building trust with communities","Technologies":"Communication tools for public health messaging","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities and community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of culturally-relevant risk communication strategies","Impact":"Ineffective response to the pandemic in diverse communities","Mitigation":"Developing culturally-relevant risk communication strategies and adopting WHO guidelines","Technologies":"Communication tools for public health messaging","People":"Diverse communities, especially in countries with cultural diversity","Owner":"Health authorities and community leaders"}]}
